#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
long long a[5000][5000]={0};
int main()
{
    long long m,n,p,x;
    scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&m,&n,&p);
    long long b,c,i,j;
    for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
            a[i][j]=0;
    }
    for(i=0;i<p;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld%lld",&b,&c);
        a[b][c]=-1;
    }
    for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
    {
        if(a[i][1]==-1)
            break;
        else
            a[i][1]=1;
    }
    for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
    {
        if(a[1][j]==-1)
            break;
        else
            a[1][j]=1;
    }
    for(i=2;i<=m;i++)
    {
        for(j=2;j<=n;j++)
        {
            if(a[i][j]==-1)
                continue;
            else if(a[i-1][j]!=-1&&a[i][j-1]!=-1)
            {
                a[i][j]=(a[i-1][j]+a[i][j-1]);
            }
            else if(a[i-1][j]==-1)
            {
                a[i][j]=a[i][j-1];
            }
            else if(a[i][j-1]==-1)
            {
                a[i][j]=a[i-1][j];
            }
            else
            {
                a[i][j]=0;
            }
            a[i][j]=a[i][j]%1000000007;

        }
    }
    if(a[m][n]==-1)
        cout<<"0\n";
    else
    {
        x=a[m][n]%1000000007;
        cout<<x<<"\n";
    }
}
